title: Mum's xmas
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and William Walker
brief_description: Christmas, 1970, and things look grim for Peter, Robert, Rita and Dad. As their expectant mother spells it out, a terminally ill grandparent, unemployed father, big eared grumpy guest and a present for two that has to be shared between three. Things are bound to go wrong, as they are astutely observed by eldest son, Robert. Cast includes Tina Owens, Michael and Jason Condon, Rodney Sharp and Tara Dixon.
